headline: Commercial Paving Lead Generation System
subheadline: A done-for-you inbound engine to keep your crews busy in January, February, and beyond.
situationPoints: Built a successful business through referrals and existing relationships, but growth depends on your network—not predictable demand
Losing proposals to competitors who already have relationships with property managers
Slow periods create crew downtime and inconsistent revenue
Want to be aggressive in January and February to fill the pipeline
Have capacity to take on more work but no consistent lead source outside word-of-mouth
solutionOverview: We're launching targeted advertising campaigns to capture people actively searching for paving services across Orange County and surrounding areas. Every search for 'parking lot repair,' 'asphalt paving,' or 'commercial paving company' represents someone with a need right now—and we'll make sure Beach Paving shows up first. We track and record every call so you know exactly what's working and can maximize every opportunity.

faqs.question: How quickly will I start seeing opportunities?
faqs.answer: Most clients see their first calls within 7-14 days of campaign launch. The first month is about learning which keywords convert best; results compound from there.

faqs.question: What makes these sales-ready opportunities?
faqs.answer: Every opportunity comes from someone actively searching for paving services—they have a need right now. We record all calls so you can see the quality and quantity coming in.

faqs.question: What if the campaigns don't work?
faqs.answer: If we don't deliver 40 qualified opportunities in 60 days while you meet the agreed conditions, we refund 100% of our management fees. We only win when you win.

faqs.question: What do you need from us?
faqs.answer: Respond to missed calls, form submissions, and chats within 30 minutes. Follow up at least 3 times if you don't reach them initially. Track outcomes so we know which opportunities turned into jobs.

faqs.question: Can we pause or cancel?
faqs.answer: After the initial 60-day period, it's month-to-month. No long contracts. You stay because the phone keeps ringing with qualified opportunities.

faqs.question: What's the minimum commitment?
faqs.answer: 60 days at $5,000/month total ($1,500 management + $3,500 ad spend). This gives us enough data to optimize and prove the ROI.
